title: Public enquiries and media
text_content: Public enquiries and media Public enquiriesToll-free: 1-800-442-2342 (Canada and U.S.) Telephone: 1-613-773-2342 (local or international) Email: information@inspection.gc.ca Media relationsTelephone: 613-773-6600 Email: cfia.media.acia@inspection.gc.ca
question: How can I contact public enquiries?
answer:
You can contact public enquiries through the following methods:
- Toll-free: 1-800-442-2342 (Canada and U.S.)
- Telephone: 1-613-773-2342 (local or international)
- Email: information@inspection.gc.ca
reason: overly vague and general and duplicated question
